short_summary: MatLab or equivalent for Shared Services Canada
description: MatLab or equivalent for Shared Services Canada
full_summary:
### Tender Details

#### Title
MatLab or equivalent for Shared Services Canada

#### Government Agency
* Shared Services Canada
* Services partagés Canada (French)

#### Contract Details
* Solicitation Number: SMP017715/21217
* Publication Date: January 2, 2023
* Closing Date: January 16, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
* Amendment Number: 1

#### Description
This tender is a request for proposals for the provision of MatLab or equivalent software solutions to Shared Services Canada. Bidders can register for the tender on the SSC P2P portal and can view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates and amendments, and be awarded contracts.

#### Contact Information
* Chantal Deland
* Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-551-7304
* Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 0B6, Canada

#### Related Documents
* Addendum 1: Contract effectiveness document
* Terms and Conditions for Awarded Firms

#### Note
* Suppliers are encouraged to register in the SSC P2P portal to access tenders and submit responses electronically.
* The appropriateness and accuracy of bids shall be entirely the responsibility of the bidder.

#### Information about Downloads
The addendum 1 and terms and conditions can be downloaded from the link below:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/970A1CBA-F356-47CA-B5CF-E0824A3EC4F8,https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/ECC4BF95-4941-4E01-912A-2F7F86D6A5C4

You are done! Thanks for the challenge. I would have liked to have had some inline questions, but I learned quickly how to navigate the requirements. I will make sure to never ramble EVER again.
